DOC.brief_summary: This study aim investigate effect physical training exercise capacity change heart rate variability ( HRV ) rest , exercise , post-exercise patient diabetes autonomic neuropathy ( DAN ) .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Physical Training Heart Rate Variability Exercise Capacity Diabetes With Autonomic Neuropathy
DOC.criteria: age 65 year old receive regular treatment HbA1c < 8.0 decreased HR response deep breathing maneuver heart disease neuromusculoskeletal diseases take medication may affect HRV ( α βblockers )
